factual_disputes.description: REAL contradictions on facts (numbers, dates, quotes). Empty array [] if none. Max 3.

what.description: What is disputed. Example: 'Oscar year'. Max 8 words.

claim_a.description: First claim with specific numbers/dates. Max 25 words.

claim_b.description: Conflicting claim with specific numbers/dates. Max 25 words.

sources_a.description: Exact SOURCE NAMES making claim A (e.g., 'VEJA', 'G1', 'Variety'). NOT 'Article 1'.

sources_b.description: Exact SOURCE NAMES making claim B (e.g., 'VEJA', 'G1', 'Variety'). NOT 'Article 2'.
